com.SocScore.framework.data

Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SocScore.framework.data.Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
    Object which stores all information related to a single team.

        Initializes a new team with given name.

    • Method Detail

      • resetPlayers

        public void resetPlayers()
        Resets the list of Player to a new ArrayList, used when loading data from disk to prevent duplicates
        See Also:
        PlayerAnalysis.loadPlayersFromDisk()

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(Player player)
        Allows to add a new player to the team.
        Parameters:
        player - Player object to be added to the team.

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(Player player)
        Allows to remove a player from the team.
        Parameters:
        player - Player object to be removed.

      • startMatch

        public void startMatch()
                throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Starts a new match, sets all players to their initial player.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Throws an exception if there aren't at least 11 players in the team

      • endMatch

        public void endMatch(int winnerID,
            int goals)
        Ends a match, and updates attributes for the team and its players.
        Parameters:
        winnerID - the team ID of the winning team.
        goals - the number of goals scored by the team.
        See Also:
        updateTeamScore(), Match.endMatch(LocalDateTime)
